name: da-IdeaCoach
title: Idea Coach Declarative Agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot Sample
shortDescription: First Party Declarative Agent Idea Coach shared as a sample
longDescription: The "Idea Coach" is a comprehensive brainstorming agent designed to assist users in generating ideas, planning brainstorming sessions, finding engaging exercises, organizing ideas, providing constructive feedback, and enhancing brainstorming skills, leveraging the capabilities of OneDrive, SharePoint, and Graph Connectors to streamline and optimize the brainstorming process.

thumbnails.alt: Idea Coach Declarative Agent for Microsoft 365 Copilot Sample
